references.reason: This paper is considered important because it introduced the Transformer architecture, which is heavily used in video diffusion models.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is considered important because it introduced Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), which are the basis for many subsequent video generation models.
This paper is considered important because it introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are the foundation for many generative models.
This paper is considered important because it introduced denoising diffusion implicit models (DDIM), a faster and more controllable sampling method for diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Flow straight and fast: Learning to generate and transfer data with rectified flow
references.reason: This paper is important because it introduces rectified flows, offering an alternative to traditional diffusion models for generative tasks and data transformation.
